col_names: Electricity from other renewables including bioenergy (TWh)
description:
Renewable energy is energy that is collected from renewable resources that are naturally replenished on a human timescale. It includes sources such as sunlight, wind, rain, tides, waves, and geothermal heat. Although most renewable energy sources are sustainable, some are not. Wikipedia

> @article{owidenergy,
    author = {Hannah Ritchie, Max Roser and Pablo Rosado},
    title = {Energy},

title: Renewable Energy
